Summary: this was recorded with infrared security cam, nothing could be observed in naked eye or was recorded by security cams without infrared capabilities.
divs: Sighting Detailsi did not witness this, i received the link from a friend of the witness which lives in Mesquita, Vila Emil, Rio de janeiro, and wishes to remain annonimous for now. He is afraid for his family and his own security. It has been published in youtube, and that is where i took this video from. I wish you at MUFON to see if this video, made with a security camera wth infrared capabilities, has any credibility or if it was not faked. In case you at MUFON find this video as being trustfull i am prepared to try and sort more accurate information on the witness so that an original record can be obtained. Most intriguing in this video is the cat which crosses the street.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Rio de Janeiro
There were no other sightings in Rio de Janeiro on or around April 16th 2013
